channel.title: How to make npc walk? :)
channel.description: Hello Moparscapers.. I made some new npc's in my 508 server what I'm going to upload and post in the download section. But, so I added the npc's and the walk coords, but the don't walk. I don't know what I do wrong but, they just doesn't walk. I made the code like this but nothing looks weird to me: [code]spawn = 5920 3210 3466 0 3214 3462 3210 3466 Guard[/code] So I added the code for the npc but he just don't walk. How I fix it?? :confused:

item.title: How to make npc walk? :)
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

kihomura I added you on msn can you come on msn plz so you can explain it better?
Cuz I didn’t get it really good.
My msn is mafkeesmaf@live.nl
I added you.
kihomura@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npc walk? :)
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

spawn = 0 xCoord yCoord 0 xCoord+1 yCoord+1 xCoord-1 yCoord-1 1 Hans

The ‘xCoord+1’ stands for the original standing coordinates increased by an integer of 1. (eg; If your original standing coordinates were 3000, then xCoord+1 would be 3001.)
And you would do the same for ‘yCoord+1’.

Now, the ‘xCoord-1’ stands for the original coordinated decreased by 1. (eg; If your standing coordinates were 3000, then xCoord-1 would be 2999.)
The same would go for ‘yCoord-1’.

Now here would be an example of what it could be:

spawn = 0	3000	3000	0	3001	3001	2999	2999	1	Hans

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npc walk? :)
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Hello Moparscapers…
I made some new npc’s in my 508 server what I’m going to upload and post in the download section.
But, so I added the npc’s and the walk coords, but the don’t walk. I don’t know what I do wrong but, they just doesn’t walk.
I made the code like this but nothing looks weird to me:

spawn	=	5920	3210	3466	0	3214	3462	3210	3466	Guard

So I added the code for the npc but he just don’t walk.
How I fix it??

Read full topic
